thread.section_title: Hilton London Angel Islington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 3 Night business trip
thread.title_full: 3 Night business trip - Review of Hilton London Angel Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: MJ K
title: 3 Night business trip
text:
I stayed here for three nights to attend a conference, the rooms are big with enough space not like other places ive visited, clean rooms, wide variety of food for breakfast, friendly and helpful staff, the business center where we hd the event is a few steps away.
Area around has lots of restaurants, cafe's and shops.
Would recommend this hotel
